WiseAker2

WiseAker2 here. I have been involved in a discussion/debate on the thread called the Silent Scream as "WiseAker". Apparently, if the pro-life arguments are too strong they are removed from 4Forums as this one has been. What happened to the Silent Scream thread?
 
 Liberals love to claim that they are open-minded and for free speech but that's only if they're not losing the debate. If arguments against choice are too strong they are shut down and removed. I wonder how many others who've demolished the so-called reasoning of the pro-choicers here have been kicked out as I've been or had their posts removed as mine have been.
 
 Yeah, the left is for free speech as long as they agree with it. Good luck to all of you who want to run in the woods with blinders on! 
 
 Read The Unaborted Socrates by Kreeft freethinkers!

whistler

Wiseaker--get over yourself. Silent Scream was pulled not because you are a supreme debater and developed an irrefutable position against abortion. It was pulled because you advocated the killing of physicians who perform abortions.
 
 Furthermore, I did not report the thread at all and I certainly would never do something like that because I felt I was losing a debate. 
 
 Regardless, I think there is an important distinction that should be made here. 
 
 Murdering a physician is illegal and that will never change. 
 An abortion, while you might believe it to be murder, is currently legal. 
 
 Thus promoting abortion is legal while promoting the murder of adults isn't. I can certainly see why that thread was locked down. I wouldn't be suprised if this one wasn't too far behind.
